rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that aligns with Vastu principles by facing the east for auspicious energy. It includes a reception area and storage.
Spacious living room located on the ground floor with south-facing windows for natural light as per Vastu norms. Includes sofa seating and entertainment center.
Adjacent to the living room, designed with east-facing openings, facilitating a harmonious dining experience in line with Vastu guidelines.
Modern kitchen located on the ground floor, north facing to avoid direct sunlight as recommended by traditional design principles.
A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony, south or west-facing orientation for proper ventilation and privacy. Adheres to Vastu by ensuring the headboard is not in direct line with the door.
Additional bedroom with a balcony, designed for guest comfort and privacy. South-facing window ensures ample natural light per Vastu recommendations.
Functional space allocated for staff with basic amenities, north-east facing to maintain positive energy flow according to Vastu.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance aligned with the east or north-east direction as per Vastu principles.
Ensures smooth transition from the entrance hall to the living space.
Provides natural light while avoiding direct sunlight exposure in the kitchen area.
Balcony designed to offer privacy and ventilation, with Vastu-compliant south or west orientation.
Ensures ample natural light and proper airflow in the guest bedroom.

rooms.description: An alternate version of the master bedroom on the first floor with a spacious balcony facing south or west for optimal privacy and airflow. Vastu guidelines are considered by ensuring that the bed does not directly face the door.

A duplex studio apartment design incorporating a combined living/dining space with a kitchenette and built-in storage. This area adheres to Vastu by ensuring the layout promotes an unobstructed flow of energy.
A compact space for servants, aligned with traditional architectural norms and Vastu principles by facing north-east.

openings.description: A central staircase connecting ground and first floor, designed with adequate width for safe movement.
A balcony that provides natural light and ventilation to the studio apartment area.
